system.description:
Your resonating chant causes yourself and your allies in a near area centered on you to become rooted in place and grow barklike skin, giving a +2 AC bonus. You and your allies are rooted in place until the chant ends.

@UUID[Compendium.unnatural-selection.chant-and-spell-effects.Item.wIGzUMaUTjpPnpPV]{Spell Effect: Gift of Earth}
